name: E2-fishos
body:
###What is FishOS?
Fish os is OS made completely in E2. In other word a version of lua used to make in game programs. Everything is made in gmod using wiremod. FishOS is os made for all types of gamemode. Most likely for darkrp.

###Main goal
My main goal is to bring E2 programists together and make OS. I know that this is not easy but this is open source project. Everyone who will make working changes to code will be contributor

###What you need to know to be contributor?
Don't make code that will be made only like that:
if(ASDjh) {
asdhkjas
}
else {
asdhjkash
}

You should use math mainly math e.g.
EGP:egpBox(1,vec2(12,124),vec2(126,126)*ON)

Variables for making os:
ON - value that is telling if pc is ON or OFF it can be only 1 or 0
Desk - value that is telling if PC has booted up or not it can only be 1 or 0

###Contact
e-mail: wojcieszko@hotmail.com or chuj6669@gmail.com

ts: abot.tk
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
